 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package opennlp.ccg.hylo

Interface Summary
Mode A interface for hybrid logic nominals, to allow polymorphism for both Modality labels and variables over Modality labels.
Nominal A interface for hybrid logic nominals, to allow polymorphism for both Nominal atoms and Nominal variables.
 

Class Summary
Alt Class for representing alts.
Box A modal box operator, such as [F]q.
Compacter A class implementing compaction of flattened LFs.
Converter A class implementing conversion of nominal variables to nominal atoms.
Diamond A modal diamond operator, such as <P>p.
EnglishAgreementExtractor Class which extracts subject verb and relative pronoun agreement features for English (described in):
EnglishAgreementExtractor.FeatureMapWrapper Feature map wrapper, for unique retrieval from a sign's data objects.
EPsScorer A class implementing LF scoring in terms of recall and precision of elementary predications.
EPsScorer.Results Class for scoring results.
Flattener A class for performing flattening operations on LFs.
HyloAtom A logical atomic formula.
HyloFormula A parent class to implement reasonable default behavior for classes representing data structures for hybrid logic.
HyloHelper A utility class to help with certain global operations over hybrid logic terms.
HyloVar A class for objects which can stand for any HyloFormula object.
LexDependency A class for tracking semantic dependencies between lexical items.
LexDepFeatureExtractor A class for extracting lexical dependency features.
LexDepFeatureExtractor.ConditionalLazyEvaluator Conditional lazy evaluator, for lazily extracting a feature and its value, subject to a test.
LexDepFeatureExtractor.ConditionalLazyExtractor Conditional lazy extractor, for lazily extracting a feature subject to a test.
LexDepFeatureExtractor.DefiniteNP Class for storing whether a sign is or immediately contains a definite NP.
LexDepFeatureExtractor.FeatureMapWrapper Feature map wrapper, for unique retrieval from a sign's data objects.
LexDepFeatureExtractor.PhraseLengths Class for storing length of phrase in words, puncts and (finite) verbs, for unique retrieval from a sign's data objects.
ModalOp A parent class for modal operators, such as <P>p, [F]q, and <>(p ^ q).
ModeLabel A modality label.
ModeVar A class for variables over ModeLabel objects.
NominalAtom A hybrid logic nominal, an atomic formula which holds true at exactly one point in a model.
NominalVar A class for variables over NominalAtom objects.
Op A generic operator, such as conjunction, disjunction, exclusive-or, negation or optionality (^, v, v_, ~, ?).
Proposition A propositional value, such as the predicate "sleep", or the value of a semantic feature, such as "past" for tense.
SatOp A hybrid logic satifaction operator, which tests whether a formula is true a particular point named by a nominal.
